markdown:
<title level="1" right="Focus 4" pfs="Standard">
[Enduring Might](/Spells.aspx?ID=1819)
<actions string="Reaction" />
</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Uncommon" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=159" />
<trait label="Cleric" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=554" />
<trait label="Focus" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=511" />
<trait label="Manipulate" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=104" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

**Source** [Player Core](/Sources.aspx?ID=216) pg. 377 <sup>2.0</sup>

**Domain**
[Might](/Domains.aspx?ID=83)

<row gap="medium">

 

**Trigger** An attack or effect would deal damage to you

</row>

<row gap="medium">

</row>

<row gap="medium">

</row>

</column>

---

Your own might mingles with divine power to protect you from harm. You gain resistance equal to 8 plus your Strength modifier against all damage from the triggering attack or effect.

---
**Heightened (+1)** The resistance increases by 2.
name: Enduring Might
